TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1133
TEI.2.document_title: William and Andrew Rabb to Stephen F Austin, 06-10-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: William and Andrew Rabb to Austin, June 10, 11, 1825. Concerning the Buckner case.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1133

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William and Andrew Rabb to Austin, June 10, 11, 1825. Concerning the Buckner case.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-10-1825">June 10. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Agreeably to your request I have posted up the address which you sent to the *person_mentioned*people of this *location_mentioned*nieghborhood*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, also the Documents accompanying it */p* *p**person_mentioned*Wm Rabb*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*:*/p*
*p*This is to certify that I read the above mentioned address and documents *location_mentioned*at the houses of *person_mentioned*Mr. Buckner*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Jackson */person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*in presence of *person_mentioned*most of the people of *location_mentioned*theis nieghborhood*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*—*date_mentioned n="06-10-1825">June 10 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Andrew Rabb*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Big Bernard*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-11-1825">June 11—1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Sir*/p*
*p*Agreeably to Your summon I have proceded thus far but on account of the complaint with which I am afflicted, I am unable to ride any further: If however my evidence should be material, I shall perhaps be able in a day or two to come to Town—All I know in this case is what almost every other person knows, with, perhaps, this exception—A few days ago, when in company with *person_mentioned*Mr. Buckner*/person_mentioned*, he observed, that If you prosecuted *person_mentioned*Jackson*/person_mentioned*, it would only be thro' malice, and that he (*person_mentioned*Buckner*/person_mentioned*) would fight for *person_mentioned*Jackson */person_mentioned*" as long as he had a drop of blood in his veins "*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Andrew Rabb*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To*person_mentioned* Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
